mapper.select: select pno, pname, img1, pprice, saleprice, deliveryprice, subno from product where pno=#{param1}
select username, zipcode, addr, detailaddr, tel, email from member where userid=#{param1}
select * from point where pointno=(select max(pointno) from point where userid=#{param1})
select cpnno, userid, cpnname, apply, salerate, to_char(cpnstart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') cpnstart, to_char(cpnend, 'yyyy-mm-dd') cpnend, cpnadno from coupon where userid=#{param1} and cpnend>=sysdate-1
select distinct(p.subno) from cart c join product p on c.pno=p.pno where userid=#{param1}
select count(cpnNo) from coupon where userid=#{param1} and cpnend>=sysdate-1 and apply=${param2}
select cpnno, userid, cpnname, apply, salerate from coupon where cpnno=${param1}
mapper.insert: insert into orderTbl(orderno, orderdate, userid, arr, arrtel, arrzipcode, arraddr, arrdetailaddr, request, pluspoint, usepoint, usecoupon, totalprice, applyNum, imp_uid, merchant_uid) values(#{orderno}, sysdate, #{userid}, #{arr}, #{arrtel}, #{arrzipcode}, #{arraddr}, #{arrdetailaddr}, #{request}, #{pluspoint}, #{usepoint}, #{usecoupon}, #{totalprice}, #{applynum}, #{imp_uid}, #{merchant_uid})
insert into suborder(suborderno, orderno, pno, pname, optinfo, quantity, subprice) values(subordersq.nextval, #{orderno}, #{pno}, #{pname}, #{optinfo}, #{quantity}, #{subprice})
mapper.select: select p.pname, p.img1, s.optinfo, s.quantity, p.pprice, p.saleprice, p.deliveryprice, s.subprice from product p join suborder s on p.pno=s.pno where orderno=#{param1}
select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') orderdate, o.orderno, status, m.username, m.tel, arr, arrtel, request from orderTbl o join member m on o.userid=m.userid order by orderdate desc
mapper.update: update orderTbl set status=#{param2} where orderno=#{param1}
mapper.select: select count(case when to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') then 1 end) as neworder, count(case when status='배송준비' then 1 end) as ready, count(case when status='배송중' then 1 end) as delivery, count(case when status='배송완료' then 1 end) as complete from orderTbl where 1=1 and to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{orderSearch_from} and #{orderSearch_to} and ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' and status like #{status}

select c.cartno, c.pno, c.quantity, c.optionvalue as optinfo, c.price as subprice, p.subno, p.saleprice, p.pname, p.img1, p.pprice, p.deliveryprice from cart c join product p on c.pno=p.pno where userid=#{param1}

select c.cartno, c.pno, c.quantity, c.optionvalue as optinfo, c.price as subprice, p.saleprice, p.pname, p.img1, p.pprice, p.deliveryprice, p.subno from (select * from cart where pno=#{param1}) c join product p on c.pno=p.pno where userid=#{param2}

select c.cartno, c.pno, p.subno, c.quantity, c.optionvalue as optinfo, c.price as subprice, p.saleprice, p.pname, p.img1, p.pprice, p.deliveryprice from (select * from cart where cartno=#{param1}) c join product p on c.pno=p.pno where userid=#{param2}
select o.userid, m.username, m.email, m.tel from orderTbl o join member m on o.userid=m.userid where orderno=#{param1}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cartno=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
mapper.update: update product set stock=stock-1 where pno=#{param1}

insert into point(pointno, pointdate, pointcontent, point, userid) values(pointsq.nextval, sysdate, '상품 구매', ((select point from point where pointno=(select max(pointno) from point where userid=#{userid}))-#{usepoint}), #{userid})

insert into point(pointno, pointdate, pointcontent, point, userid) values(pointsq.nextval, sysdate, '구매 적립금', ((select pluspoint from ordertbl where orderno=#{orderno})+(select nvl(max(point),0) as point from point where pointno=(select max(pointno) from point where userid=(select userid from ordertbl where orderno=#{orderno})))), (select userid from ordertbl where orderno=#{orderno}))
